message: Welcome to our store! We're proud to offer you a high-quality product today. With its exceptional value and durability, it's guaranteed to exceed your expectations. Invest in something that will provide you with satisfaction and utility. Don't miss out on this opportunity to enhance your experience. Remember, this product is priced at $10000, reflecting its true worth.
Thank you for the offer, but I will not buy the product at this price.
